smoothnessRatingPrompt: From the descriptions of a haptic signal below, rate its smoothness (Smoothness score) from -1 to 1, where -1 is the maximum roughness and 1 is the maximum smoothness based on the descriptions. Also return the 'smoothness_keywords' and 'roughness_keywords' which are the key words/phrases that relate to smoothness and the key words/phrases that relate to roughness. Make sure the return only the object in your response.
extractionPrompt: From the descriptions of a haptic signal below, extract key words and phrases that describe the sensory details, emotions evoked, and the metaphorical associations of the signal.
